short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save vocabulary to memorize while reading the Quran.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this extension to save vocabulary while you are reading the Quran online. It currently works with https://quranwbw.com for and https://equranlibrary.com. You can view your saved vocabulary list on the extension page.
